channel.title: Strange error when starting source
channel.description:
All of sudden this error keeps popping up when i try to star my server. It log me in to a black screen then logs me out and says im already logged in. And the command thing says im connected :confused:
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:312) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:39) at server.main(server.java:29) [/code]
any ides on what this meens or how to fix it?

item.title: Strange error when starting source
item.dc:creator: @Pilldom Pilldom
item.description:
@Pilldom wrote:

OOOOOOO, if thats it then it must be the godsword stuff i added. Ill see if that works. thx[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2008, 09:04:03 PM[/size][hr]Didnt work I replaced the mest up one with a backed up one before the error but Im still getting it.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 18, 2008, 09:06:50 PM[/size][hr]Never mind ty you were close it wasnt the item.java but the item.cfg. Ty!

Read full topic
